DOC.brief_summary: Efficacy different protocol transcranial magnetic stimulation treatment tinnitus
DOC.brief_title: Repetitive Transcranial Magnetic Stimulation Treatment Tinnitus
DOC.detailed_description: Repetitive transcranial magnetic stimulation ( rTMS ) dorsolateral prefrontal cortex add-on effect primary auditory cortex rTMS improve tinnitus-related distress . The investigator aim investigate whether rTMS dorsolateral prefrontal cortex primary auditory cortex capable reduce tinnitus loudness .
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis chronic tinnitus Chronic subjective tinnitus 6 month Subject naive regarding rTMS Other concurrent treatment : A fourweek washout tinnitus treatment management program require prior enter study Stable enough complete study per opinion Study Physician No restriction , provide dosage place least 3 month A three month washout tinnitus treatment management program require prior enter study . Objective tinnitus tinnitus treatable cause Presence intracranial intraocular ferromagnetic materiel particle Cardiac pacemaker electronic implant ( include cochlear implant ) Serious heart disease unstable major medical condition Personal history central nervous system disorder , head injury , stroke seizure Familial history epilepsy Concomitant medication antidepressant antipsychotic Pregnant woman Others known contraindication rTMS brain MRI
